mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movies (title, eng_title, running_time, release_date, end_date, country, production, distribution, genre, director, actor, poster_img, content) VALUES (#{title}, #{engTitle}, #{runningTime}, #{releaseDate}, #{endDate}, #{country}, #{production}, #{distribution}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{posterImg}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE movies SET title = #{title}, eng_title = #{engTitle}, running_time = #{runningTime}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, country = #{country}, production = #{production}, distribution = #{distribution}, genre = #{genre}, director = #{director}, actor = #{actor}, poster_img = #{posterImg}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
